description:
• Unnecessary delay of instruction in a reasonable period of time. Refusal to obey legitimate, order, disrespect.

• Insolence and like behavior.

• Intentionally not following orders such as wearing prescribed uniforms (company uniform, mask, hairnet etc.) inside the company premises.

• Intentionally wearing of earrings at work (male).
title: INSUBORDINATION

description:
• Absence without leave (AWOL) is a big offense as it disrupts company operations.

• An employee is guilty of AWOL if he absents himself without approved leave of absence (LOA).

• Fails to report to work after expiration of the authorized leave, or fails to inform his supervisor about his unplanned of absence.

• Unable to work due to hangover.

• One day absence without permission is still AWOL.

• If sick, need to submit a Medical Certificate.
title: ABSENCE WITHOUT OFFICIAL LEAVE

description: • An employee should be in his designed location on or before his designated time (reckoned monthly).
title: TARDINESS

description:
• Idleness, wasting time, unauthorized participation in activities within duty hours which are outside of regularly assigned duties.

• Lengthily talking or entertaining of acquaintance while on duty, going away from work.
title: LOAFING

description:
• The offense is minor if there is no actual danger to safety persons or property.

• It is a major offense if it causes danger to a person’s property or in all cases when the employee’s concerned if responsible for the safeguarding of property and person.
title: SLEEPING ON DUTY

description: • Spoilage or waste of materials or delay in production, covering up or attempting to conceal defective work without permission is to failure to do assigned tasks.
title: CARELESS WORKMANSHIP OR  NEGLIGENCE

description:
• Includes discrepancies in cash and failure to safeguard company property.

• Loss of any borrowed company property such as tools, etc.
title: LOSS OR DAMAGE TO, UNAUTHORIZED USE OR WILLFUL DESTRUCTION OF COMPANY PROPERTY, RECORDS OR INFORMATION

description:
• Actual or attempted taking and carrying away company property or property of others.

• Stealing of goods (intended for company operation’s consumption and use such as gas, inks/paints, toluene, thinners, chemicals, metals, equipment and the like) for personal motive/use.
title: THEFT

description:
• Making false of malicious statements against other employees, supervisors or officials that harm or destroy the reputation, authority or official standing of those concerned.

• Fraud, Falsification, Exaggeration, concealment of a material fact in connection with any official document or withholding of material facts in connection with matters under official investigation.
title: FALSE STATEMENTS, MISREPRESENTATION, DEFAMATION

description:
• Rude, boisterous display, use of disrespectful, abusive or offensive language, quarreling or inciting to quarrel.

• Fighting, Threatening or inflicting bodily harm on others, physical resistance to competent authority; indecent to immoral conduct.
title: DISORDERLY CONDUCT / MISBEHAVIOR

description: • Promotion, or assistance in the operation of Gambling or participation in gambling in any of the company buildings/units, and their premises.
title: GAMBLING

description:
• Drinking or possessing intoxicants on duty.

• Being on duty or reporting for duty under the influence of intoxicants as to be unable to perform assigned duties, or as to be hazard to self or others.
title: USE OF INTOXICANTS

description: • Unless authorized, an employee cannot bring in and out any item belong to the company it with any of his possessions without permission.
title: UNAUTHORIZED POSSESSION OR TRAFFICKING OF ITEMS

description: • If by his action or concern he/she has caused any interruption or disruption of operation in any of the company units, he or she is answerable to it.
title: INTERRUPTION OR DISRUPTION OF OPERATIONS

description:
• Leaving the job site and or the company before time – out without management permission or filing of undertime slip.

• Inability to report to work in more than one day without notifying the management.
title: ABANDONMENT OF WORK

description: • Refusal to testify or provide information in connection with official adverse action or grievance hearing, unless such testimony would tend to incriminate him or her.
title: REFUSAL TO TESTIFY

description: • Making negative comments against the company, divulging of confidential matters.
title: DISLOYALTY TO THE COMPANY

description:
• Disorderly or any misconduct in the job which damages the company’s name and reputation.

• Engaged in Sexual Harassment/Sexual attempt

• Showing Public Display of Affection (PDA) while at work.
title: INDECENCY / INDECENT MISCONDUCT

description: • Writing on the walls and company fixtures tearing or defacing posters and posted announcements and any announcement or any material.
title: VANDALISM

description:
• Accepting and favor or gratitude, directly or indirectly from anyone conducting procurement activities or business transactions of any sort with the company.

• If such favor or gratuity might influence or might reasonable be interpreted as seeking to influence the employee impartially.
title: GRATUITIES

description: • Unauthorized canvassing, soliciting or peddling among employees and or members of the company.
title: CANVASSING, SOLICITING AND PEDDLING

description:
• Grave and aggravated violations of administrative rules or regulations, involving offenses of a serious nature such as any form of drug involvement.

• Willful entry into exclusive areas, picture taking of similar nature not covered by a rule or regulations.
title: VIOLATION OF OTHER ADMINISTRATIVE RULES OR REGULATIONS NOT SPECIFICALLY MENTIONED HEREIN

description:
• Another form of fraud, falsification, exaggeration and other aggravated violations and destroying company’s reputation and customer’s trust.

• Intentionally doing malicious actions for personal agenda resulting to harming both company’s and customer’s operation.

• Example: Quality in printing and cutting incorrect declaration of number of pieces and kilo or lacking pieces in one pack.
title: GRAVE MISCONDUCT

description:
• The company is not allowing having an employee who has a fraternity and sorority. 

• In case, a newly hired employee is being recruited by a co – worker in the company and able to join or participate will be automatically dismissed. For any reason. And so the recruiter.

• An existing Fraternity and Sorority in the group will face consequences when he/she is making ally to his/her co – worker.
title: BROTHERHOOD / FRATERNITY AND SISTERHOOD / SORORITY

description: • The company is not allowing any employee to have affection with any co-employee moreover when it is legally committed outside.
title: NO RELATIONSHIP

description:
• Subordinates are required to obtain an approval from superiors prior to use of overtime.

• Employees who anticipate the need for overtime to complete the week’s work must notify the superiors in advance and obtain approval before working hours that extend their normal schedule.

• During busy periods employees must or maybe required to work extended hours.
title: MANDATORY OVERTIME

description:
• Stating Absence due to sickness or having relative through text or call, but not really sick.

• Unable to provide proof of absences.
title: FEIGNING SICKNESS / MALINGERING

description: • Uttering foul words/insults, engaging gossips or rumors and /or showing disrespectful moves against the authorities (owners of the company, management, immediate superiors, team, team leaders and security guards).
title: DISRESPECTFUL TOWARDS AUTHORITIES

description: • Uttering foul words/insults, engaging gossips or rumors and /or showing untoward moves to co-workers.
title: DISRESPECTFUL TOWARDS CO-EMPLOYEES

description: • Bringing MP3 or MP4, cell phones, headsets, digital cameras and like during working hours without unless if your superior told you to bring your gadget for some work related).
title: UNAUTHORIZED BRINGING OF PERSONAL GADGET AT WORK

description: • Failure to clean, tidy, file and or arrange the working space to assigned area.
title: UNCLEANLINESS / UNTIDINESS / DISORDERLINESS OF WORKING SPACE OR ASSIGNED AREA

description:
• Failure to wear proper uniform.

• Incomplete uniform.

• Not wearing of company uniform, hairnet, close shoes, pants and etc.
title: NOT WEARING OF COMPLETE UNIFORM

description:
• Rough play in which people push and hit each other.

• Behave in a silly way.

• Playing like a child in the production area.
title: HORSEPLAY

description:
• Bringing of Children inside the production area is strictly prohibited.

• Children should only be staying at the waiting area/guard house.
title: BRINGING OF CHILDREN INSIDE THE PRODUCTION AREA

description: • The number of bales produced didn’t coincide with the report and in the actual count.
title: THERE IS A VARIANCE BETWEEN THE ACTUAL COUNT AND THE MACHINE REPORT REGARDING THE NUMBER OF BALES PRODUCED

description:
• Unable to write total output in job order, unable to hand over filled in job order to next process ( operators , delivery in-charge , job order in-charge / office )

• Continuously  writing all outputs in a job order of one specific item without reviewing the required kilos / pieces on it ( it may lead to sluggishness in forwarding all job order in the office )
title: INTENTIONALLY NOT PERFORMING IMPORTANT TASK IN LINE OF A CERTAIN WORK PROCESS THAT MAY LEAD TO INTERRUPTION OF NEXT PROCESS

description:
• Smoking in all premises is strictly prohibited.

• Bringing of cigarette inside the compound.
title: NO SMOKING INSIDE THE COMPOUND

description: • Double check if there is lacking of quantity that has been packed or delivered.
title: LACKING OF QUANTITY IN EVERY BUNDLE / BALE / SACKS

description:
• Severe absences (reckoned weekly or monthly)

• If sick, need to submit a medical certificate.
title: EXCESSIVE ABSENCES FOR PAPERBOY GATHERS

description:
• Using of prohibited or illegal drugs at work.

• Bringing of drugs at work.
title: USE OF ILLEGAL DRUGS

description: • Lacking or incomplete machine reports for both gathers and operators.
title: INCOMPLETE MACHINE REPORTS

title: test0
